00170 /*!
00171  * \brief Deletes the aji_client data structure.
00172  * \param obj is the structure we will delete.
00173  * \return void.
00174  */
00175 static void aji_client_destroy(struct aji_client *obj)
00176 {
00177    struct aji_message *tmp;
00178    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_DESTROYALL(&obj->buddies, aji_buddy_destroy);
00179    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_DESTROY(&obj->buddies);
00180    iks_filter_delete(obj->f);
00181    iks_parser_delete(obj->p);
00182    iks_stack_delete(obj->stack);
00183    AST_LIST_LOCK(&obj->messages);
00184    while ((tmp = AST_LIST_REMOVE_HEAD(&obj->messages, list))) {
00185       if (tmp->from)
00186          free(tmp->from);
00187       if (tmp->message)
00188          free(tmp->message);
00189    }
00190    AST_LIST_HEAD_DESTROY(&obj->messages);
00191    free(obj);
00192 }
00193 
00194 /*!
00195  * \brief Deletes the aji_buddy data structure.
00196  * \param obj is the structure we will delete.
00197  * \return void.
00198  */
00199 static void aji_buddy_destroy(struct aji_buddy *obj)
00200 {
00201    struct aji_resource *tmp;
00202 
00203    while ((tmp = obj->resources)) {
00204       obj->resources = obj->resources->next;
00205       free(tmp->description);
00206       free(tmp);
00207    }
00208 
00209    free(obj);
00210 }

00212 /*!
00213  * \brief Find version in XML stream and populate our capabilities list
00214  * \param node the node attribute in the caps element we'll look for or add to 
00215  * our list
00216  * \param version the version attribute in the caps element we'll look for or 
00217  * add to our list
00218  * \param pak the XML stanza we're processing
00219  * \return a pointer to the added or found aji_version structure
00220  */ 
00221 static struct aji_version *aji_find_version(char *node, char *version, ikspak *pak)
00222 {
00223    struct aji_capabilities *list = NULL;
00224    struct aji_version *res = NULL;
00225 
00226    list = capabilities;
00227 
00228    if(!node)
00229       node = pak->from->full;
00230    if(!version)
00231       version = "none supplied.";
00232    while(list) {
00233       if(!strcasecmp(list->node, node)) {
00234          res = list->versions;
00235          while(res) {
00236              if(!strcasecmp(res->version, version))
00237                 return res;
00238              res = res->next;
00239          }
00240          /* Specified version not found. Let's add it to 
00241             this node in our capabilities list */
00242          if(!res) {
00243             res = (struct aji_version *)malloc(sizeof(struct aji_version));
00244             if(!res) {
00245                ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory!\n");
00246                return NULL;
00247             }
00248             res->jingle = 0;
00249             res->parent = list;
00250             ast_copy_string(res->version, version, sizeof(res->version));
00251             res->next = list->versions;
00252             list->versions = res;
00253             return res;
00254          }
00255       }
00256       list = list->next;
00257    }
00258    /* Specified node not found. Let's add it our capabilities list */
00259    if(!list) {
00260       list = (struct aji_capabilities *)malloc(sizeof(struct aji_capabilities));
00261       if(!list) {
00262          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory!\n");
00263          return NULL;
00264       }
00265       res = (struct aji_version *)malloc(sizeof(struct aji_version));
00266       if(!res) {
00267          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory!\n");
00268          return NULL;
00269       }
00270       ast_copy_string(list->node, node, sizeof(list->node));
00271       ast_copy_string(res->version, version, sizeof(res->version));
00272       res->jingle = 0;
00273       res->parent = list;
00274       res->next = NULL;
00275       list->versions = res;
00276       list->next = capabilities;
00277       capabilities = list;
00278    }
00279    return res;
00280 }
00281 
00282 static struct aji_resource *aji_find_resource(struct aji_buddy *buddy, char *name)
00283 {
00284    struct aji_resource *res = NULL;
00285    if (!buddy || !name)
00286       return res;
00287    res = buddy->resources;
00288    while (res) {
00289       if (!strcasecmp(res->resource, name)) {
00290          break;
00291       }
00292       res = res->next;
00293    }
00294    return res;
00295 }

00297 static int gtalk_yuck(iks *node)
00298 {
00299    if (iks_find_with_attrib(node, "c", "node", "http://www.google.com/xmpp/client/caps"))
00300       return 1;
00301    return 0;
00302 }

00304 /*!
00305  * \brief Detects the highest bit in a number.
00306  * \param Number you want to have evaluated.
00307  * \return the highest power of 2 that can go into the number.
00308  */
00309 static int aji_highest_bit(int number)
00310 {
00311    int x = sizeof(number) * 8 - 1;
00312    if (!number)
00313       return 0;
00314    for (; x > 0; x--) {
00315       if (number & (1 << x))
00316          break;
00317    }
00318    return (1 << x);
00319 }
00320 
00321 static iks *jabber_make_auth(iksid * id, const char *pass, const char *sid)
00322 {
00323    iks *x, *y;
00324    x = iks_new("iq");
00325    iks_insert_attrib(x, "type", "set");
00326    y = iks_insert(x, "query");
00327    iks_insert_attrib(y, "xmlns", IKS_NS_AUTH);
00328    iks_insert_cdata(iks_insert(y, "username"), id->user, 0);
00329    iks_insert_cdata(iks_insert(y, "resource"), id->resource, 0);
00330    if (sid) {
00331       char buf[41];
00332       char sidpass[100];
00333       snprintf(sidpass, sizeof(sidpass), "%s%s", sid, pass);
00334       ast_sha1_hash(buf, sidpass);
00335       iks_insert_cdata(iks_insert(y, "digest"), buf, 0);
00336    } else {
00337       iks_insert_cdata(iks_insert(y, "password"), pass, 0);
00338    }
00339    return x;
00340 }
00341 
00342 /*!
00343  * \brief Dial plan function status(). puts the status of watched user 
00344    into a channel variable.
00345  * \param channel, and username,watched user, status var
00346  * \return 0.
00347  */
00348 static int aji_status_exec(struct ast_channel *chan, void *data)
00349 {
00350    struct aji_client *client = NULL;
00351    struct aji_buddy *buddy = NULL;
00352    struct aji_resource *r = NULL;
00353    char *s = NULL, *sender = NULL, *jid = NULL, *screenname = NULL, *resource = NULL, *variable = NULL;
00354    int stat = 7;
00355    char status[2];
00356 
00357    if (!data) {
00358       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "This application requires arguments.\n");
00359       return 0;
00360    }
00361    s = ast_strdupa(data);
00362    if (s) {
00363       sender = strsep(&s, "|");
00364       if (sender && (sender[0] != '\0')) {
00365          jid = strsep(&s, "|");
00366          if (jid && (jid[0] != '\0')) {
00367             variable = s;
00368          } else {
00369             ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Bad arguments\n");
00370             return -1;
00371          }
00372       }
00373    }
00374 
00375    if(!strchr(jid, '/')) {
00376       resource = NULL;
00377    } else {
00378       screenname = strsep(&jid, "/");
00379       resource = jid;
00380    }
00381    client = ast_aji_get_client(sender);
00382    if (!client) {
00383       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Could not find sender connection: %s\n", sender);
00384       return -1;
00385    }
00386    if(!&client->buddies) {
00387       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "No buddies for connection : %s\n", sender);
00388       return -1;
00389    }
00390    buddy = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND(&client->buddies, resource ? screenname: jid);
00391    if (!buddy) {
00392       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Could not find buddy in list : %s\n", resource ? screenname : jid);
00393       return -1;
00394    }
00395    r = aji_find_resource(buddy, resource);
00396    if(!r && buddy->resources) 
00397       r = buddy->resources;
00398    if(!r)
00399       ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "Resource %s of buddy %s not found \n", resource, screenname);
00400    else
00401       stat = r->status;
00402    sprintf(status, "%d", stat);
00403    pbx_builtin_setvar_helper(chan, variable, status);
00404    return 0;
00405 }
00406 
00407 /*!
00408  * \brief Dial plan function to send a message.
00409  * \param channel, and data, data is sender, reciever, message.
00410  * \return 0.
00411  */
00412 static int aji_send_exec(struct ast_channel *chan, void *data)
00413 {
00414    struct aji_client *client = NULL;
00415 
00416    char *s = NULL, *sender = NULL, *recipient = NULL, *message = NULL;
00417 
00418    if (!data) {
00419       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "This application requires arguments.\n");
00420       return 0;
00421    }
00422    s = ast_strdupa(data);
00423    if (s) {
00424       sender = strsep(&s, "|");
00425       if (sender && (sender[0] != '\0')) {
00426          recipient = strsep(&s, "|");
00427          if (recipient && (recipient[0] != '\0')) {
00428             message = s;
00429          } else {
00430             ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Bad arguments: %s\n", (char *) data);
00431             return -1;
00432          }
00433       }
00434    }
00435    if (!(client = ast_aji_get_client(sender))) {
00436       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Could not find sender connection: %s\n", sender);
00437       return -1;
00438    }
00439    if (strchr(recipient, '@') && message)
00440       ast_aji_send(client, recipient, message);
00441    return 0;
00442 }

00444 /*!
00445  * \brief the debug loop.
00446  * \param aji_client structure, xml data as string, size of string, direction of packet, 1 for inbound 0 for outbound.
00447  */
00448 static void aji_log_hook(void *data, const char *xmpp, size_t size, int is_incoming)
00449 {
00450    struct aji_client *client = ASTOBJ_REF((struct aji_client *) data);
00451 
00452    if (!ast_strlen_zero(xmpp))
00453       manager_event(EVENT_FLAG_USER, "JabberEvent", "Account: %s\r\nPacket: %s\r\n", client->name, xmpp);
00454 
00455    if (client->debug) {
00456       if (is_incoming)
00457          ast_verbose("\nJABBER: %s INCOMING: %s\n", client->name, xmpp);
00458       else {
00459          if( strlen(xmpp) == 1) {
00460             if(option_debug > 2  && xmpp[0] == ' ')
00461             ast_verbose("\nJABBER: Keep alive packet\n");
00462          } else
00463             ast_verbose("\nJABBER: %s OUTGOING: %s\n", client->name, xmpp);
00464       }
00465 
00466    }
00467    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00468 }
00469 
00470 /*!
00471  * \brief The action hook parses the inbound packets, constantly running.
00472  * \param aji client structure, type of packet, the actual packet.
00473  * \return IKS_OK or IKS_HOOK .
00474  */
00475 static int aji_act_hook(void *data, int type, iks *node)
00476 {
00477    struct aji_client *client = ASTOBJ_REF((struct aji_client *) data);
00478    ikspak *pak = NULL;
00479    iks *auth = NULL;
00480 
00481    if(!node) {
00482       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "aji_act_hook was called with out a packet\n"); /* most likely cause type is IKS_NODE_ERROR lost connection */
00483       ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00484       return IKS_HOOK;
00485    }
00486 
00487    pak = iks_packet(node);
00488 
00489    if (!client->component) { /*client */
00490       switch (type) {
00491       case IKS_NODE_START:
00492          if (client->usetls && !iks_is_secure(client->p)) {
00493             if (iks_has_tls())
00494                iks_start_tls(client->p);
00495             else
00496                ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "gnuTLS not installed.\n");
00497             break;
00498          }
00499          if (!client->usesasl) {
00500             iks_filter_add_rule(client->f, aji_client_connect, client, IKS_RULE_TYPE, IKS_PAK_IQ, IKS_RULE_SUBTYPE, IKS_TYPE_RESULT, IKS_RULE_ID, client->mid, IKS_RULE_DONE);
00501             auth = jabber_make_auth(client->jid, client->password, iks_find_attrib(node, "id"));
00502             if (auth) {
00503                iks_insert_attrib(auth, "id", client->mid);
00504                iks_insert_attrib(auth, "to", client->jid->server);
00505                ast_aji_increment_mid(client->mid);
00506                iks_send(client->p, auth);
00507                iks_delete(auth);
00508             } else
00509                ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
00510          }
00511          break;
00512 
00513       case IKS_NODE_NORMAL:
00514          {
00515             int features = 0;
00516             if (!strcmp("stream:features", iks_name(node))) {
00517                features = iks_stream_features(node);
00518                if (client->usesasl) {
00519                   if (client->usetls && !iks_is_secure(client->p))
00520                      break;
00521                   if (client->authorized) {
00522                      if (features & IKS_STREAM_BIND) {
00523                         iks_filter_add_rule (client->f, aji_client_connect, client, IKS_RULE_TYPE, IKS_PAK_IQ, IKS_RULE_SUBTYPE, IKS_TYPE_RESULT, IKS_RULE_DONE);
00524                         auth = iks_make_resource_bind(client->jid);
00525                         if (auth) {
00526                            iks_insert_attrib(auth, "id", client->mid);
00527                            ast_aji_increment_mid(client->mid);
00528                            iks_send(client->p, auth);
00529                            iks_delete(auth);
00530                         } else {
00531                            ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
00532                            break;
00533                         }
00534                      }
00535                      if (features & IKS_STREAM_SESSION) {
00536                         iks_filter_add_rule (client->f, aji_client_connect, client, IKS_RULE_TYPE, IKS_PAK_IQ, IKS_RULE_SUBTYPE, IKS_TYPE_RESULT, IKS_RULE_ID, "auth", IKS_RULE_DONE);
00537                         auth = iks_make_session();
00538                         if (auth) {
00539                            iks_insert_attrib(auth, "id", "auth");
00540                            ast_aji_increment_mid(client->mid);
00541                            iks_send(client->p, auth);
00542                            iks_delete(auth);
00543                         } else {
00544                            ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
00545                         }
00546                      }
00547                   } else {
00548                      features = aji_highest_bit(features);
00549                      if (features == IKS_STREAM_SASL_MD5)
00550                         iks_start_sasl(client->p, IKS_SASL_DIGEST_MD5, client->jid->user, client->password);
00551                      else {
00552                         if (features == IKS_STREAM_SASL_PLAIN) {
00553                            iks *x = NULL;
00554                            x = iks_new("auth");
00555                            if (x) {
00556                               int len = strlen(client->jid->user) + strlen(client->password) + 3;
00557                               /* XXX Check return values XXX */
00558                               char *s = ast_malloc(80 + len);
00559                               char *base64 = ast_malloc(80 + len * 2);
00560 
00561                               iks_insert_attrib(x, "xmlns", IKS_NS_XMPP_SASL);
00562                               iks_insert_attrib(x, "mechanism", "PLAIN");
00563                               sprintf(s, "%c%s%c%s", 0, client->jid->user, 0, client->password);
00564                               ast_base64encode(base64, (const unsigned char *) s, len, len * 2);
00565                               iks_insert_cdata(x, base64, 0);
00566                               iks_send(client->p, x);
00567                               iks_delete(x);
00568                               if (base64)
00569                                  free(base64);
00570                               if (s)
00571                                  free(s);
00572                            } else {
00573                               ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
00574                            }
00575                         }
00576                      }
00577                   }
00578                }
00579             } else if (!strcmp("failure", iks_name(node))) {
00580                ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "JABBER: encryption failure. possible bad password.\n");
00581             } else if (!strcmp("success", iks_name(node))) {
00582                client->authorized = 1;
00583                iks_send_header(client->p, client->jid->server);
00584             }
00585             break;
00586          }
00587       case IKS_NODE_ERROR: 
00588             ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "JABBER: Node Error\n");
00589             ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00590             return IKS_HOOK;
00591             break;
00592       case IKS_NODE_STOP: 
00593             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "JABBER: Disconnected\n");
00594             ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00595             return IKS_HOOK;
00596             break;
00597       }
00598    } else if (client->state != AJI_CONNECTED && client->component) {
00599       switch (type) {
00600       case IKS_NODE_START:
00601          if (client->state == AJI_DISCONNECTED) {
00602             char secret[160], shasum[320], *handshake;
00603 
00604             sprintf(secret, "%s%s", pak->id, client->password);
00605             ast_sha1_hash(shasum, secret);
00606             handshake = NULL;
00607             asprintf(&handshake, "<handshake>%s</handshake>", shasum);
00608             if (handshake) {
00609                iks_send_raw(client->p, handshake);
00610                free(handshake);
00611                handshake = NULL;
00612             }
00613             client->state = AJI_CONNECTING;
00614             if(iks_recv(client->p,1) == 2) /*XXX proper result for iksemel library on iks_recv of <handshake/> XXX*/
00615                client->state = AJI_CONNECTED;
00616             else
00617                ast_log(LOG_WARNING,"Jabber didn't seem to handshake, failed to authenicate.\n");
00618             break;
00619          }
00620          break;
00621 
00622       case IKS_NODE_NORMAL:
00623          break;
00624 
00625       case IKS_NODE_ERROR:
00626          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "JABBER: Node Error\n");
00627          ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00628          return IKS_HOOK;
00629 
00630       case IKS_NODE_STOP:
00631          ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "JABBER: Disconnected\n");
00632          ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00633          return IKS_HOOK;
00634       }
00635    }
00636 
00637    switch (pak->type) {
00638    case IKS_PAK_NONE:
00639       if (option_debug)
00640          ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "JABBER: I Don't know what to do with you NONE\n");
00641       break;
00642    case IKS_PAK_MESSAGE:
00643       aji_handle_message(client, pak);
00644       if (option_debug)
00645          ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "JABBER: I Don't know what to do with you MESSAGE\n");
00646       break;
00647    case IKS_PAK_PRESENCE:
00648       aji_handle_presence(client, pak);
00649       if (option_debug)
00650          ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "JABBER: I Do know how to handle presence!!\n");
00651       break;
00652    case IKS_PAK_S10N:
00653       aji_handle_subscribe(client, pak);
00654       if (option_debug)
00655          ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "JABBER: I Dont know S10N subscribe!!\n");
00656       break;
00657    case IKS_PAK_IQ:
00658       if (option_debug)
00659          ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "JABBER: I Dont have an IQ!!!\n");
00660       aji_handle_iq(client, node);
00661       break;
00662    default:
00663       if (option_debug)
00664          ast_log(LOG_DEBUG, "JABBER: I Dont know %i\n", pak->type);
00665       break;
00666    }
00667    
00668    iks_filter_packet(client->f, pak);
00669 
00670    if (node)
00671       iks_delete(node);
00672 
00673    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00674    return IKS_OK;
00675 }
00676 
00677 static int aji_register_approve_handler(void *data, ikspak *pak)
00678 {
00679    struct aji_client *client = ASTOBJ_REF((struct aji_client *) data);
00680    iks *iq = NULL, *presence = NULL, *x = NULL;
00681 
00682    iq = iks_new("iq");
00683    presence = iks_new("presence");
00684    x = iks_new("x");
00685    if (client && iq && presence && x) {
00686       if (!iks_find(pak->query, "remove")) {
00687          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "from", client->jid->full);
00688          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "to", pak->from->full);
00689          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "id", pak->id);
00690          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "type", "result");
00691          iks_send(client->p, iq);
00692 
00693          iks_insert_attrib(presence, "from", client->jid->full);
00694          iks_insert_attrib(presence, "to", pak->from->partial);
00695          iks_insert_attrib(presence, "id", client->mid);
00696          ast_aji_increment_mid(client->mid);
00697          iks_insert_attrib(presence, "type", "subscribe");
00698          iks_insert_attrib(x, "xmlns", "vcard-temp:x:update");
00699          iks_insert_node(presence, x);
00700          iks_send(client->p, presence); 
00701       }
00702    } else {
00703       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
00704    }
00705 
00706    if (iq)
00707       iks_delete(iq);
00708    if(presence)
00709       iks_delete(presence);
00710    if (x)
00711       iks_delete(x);
00712    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00713    return IKS_FILTER_EAT;
00714 }
00715 
00716 static int aji_register_query_handler(void *data, ikspak *pak)
00717 {
00718    struct aji_client *client = ASTOBJ_REF((struct aji_client *) data);
00719    struct aji_buddy *buddy = NULL; 
00720    char *node = NULL;
00721 
00722    client = (struct aji_client *) data;
00723 
00724    buddy = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND(&client->buddies, pak->from->partial);
00725    if (!buddy) {
00726       iks *iq = NULL, *query = NULL, *error = NULL, *notacceptable = NULL;
00727 
00728       ast_verbose("Someone.... %s tried to register but they aren't allowed\n", pak->from->partial);
00729       iq = iks_new("iq");
00730       query = iks_new("query");
00731       error = iks_new("error");
00732       notacceptable = iks_new("not-acceptable");
00733       if(iq && query && error && notacceptable) {
00734          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "type", "error");
00735          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "from", client->user);
00736          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "to", pak->from->full);
00737          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "id", pak->id);
00738          iks_insert_attrib(query, "xmlns", "jabber:iq:register");
00739          iks_insert_attrib(error, "code" , "406");
00740          iks_insert_attrib(error, "type", "modify");
00741          iks_insert_attrib(notacceptable, "xmlns", "urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:xmpp-stanzas");
00742          iks_insert_node(iq, query);
00743          iks_insert_node(iq, error);
00744          iks_insert_node(error, notacceptable);
00745          iks_send(client->p, iq);
00746       } else {
00747          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
00748       }
00749       if (iq)
00750          iks_delete(iq);
00751       if (query)
00752          iks_delete(query);
00753       if (error)
00754          iks_delete(error);
00755       if (notacceptable)
00756          iks_delete(notacceptable);
00757    } else   if (!(node = iks_find_attrib(pak->query, "node"))) {
00758       iks *iq = NULL, *query = NULL, *instructions = NULL;
00759       char *explain = "Welcome to Asterisk - the Open Source PBX.\n";
00760       iq = iks_new("iq");
00761       query = iks_new("query");
00762       instructions = iks_new("instructions");
00763       if (iq && query && instructions && client) {
00764          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "from", client->user);
00765          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "to", pak->from->full);
00766          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "id", pak->id);
00767          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "type", "result");
00768          iks_insert_attrib(query, "xmlns", "jabber:iq:register");
00769          iks_insert_cdata(instructions, explain, 0);
00770          iks_insert_node(iq, query);
00771          iks_insert_node(query, instructions);
00772          iks_send(client->p, iq);
00773       } else {
00774          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
00775       }
00776       if (iq)
00777          iks_delete(iq);
00778       if (query)
00779          iks_delete(query);
00780       if (instructions)
00781          iks_delete(instructions);
00782    }
00783    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00784    return IKS_FILTER_EAT;
00785 }

00833          iks_insert_attrib(confirm, "node", "confirmaccount");
00834          iks_insert_attrib(confirm, "name", "Confirm AIM account");
00835          iks_insert_attrib(confirm, "jid", "blog.astjab.org");
00836 
00837          iks_insert_node(iq, query);
00838          iks_insert_node(query, confirm);
00839          iks_send(client->p, iq);
00840       } else {
00841          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
00842       }
00843       if (iq)
00844          iks_delete(iq);
00845       if (query)
00846          iks_delete(query);
00847       if (confirm)
00848          iks_delete(confirm);
00849 
00850    } else if (!strcasecmp(node, "confirmaccount")) {
00851       iks *iq = NULL, *query = NULL, *feature = NULL;

00864          iks_insert_node(iq, query);

00879    return IKS_FILTER_EAT;

00882 
00883 static int aji_client_info_handler(void *data, ikspak *pak)
00884 {
00885    struct aji_client *client = ASTOBJ_REF((struct aji_client *) data);
00886    struct aji_resource *resource = NULL;
00887    struct aji_buddy *buddy = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND(&client->buddies, pak->from->partial);
00888 
00889    resource = aji_find_resource(buddy, pak->from->resource);
00890    if (pak->subtype == IKS_TYPE_RESULT) {
00891       if (!resource) {
00892          ast_log(LOG_NOTICE,"JABBER: Received client info from %s when not requested.\n", pak->from->full);
00893          ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00894          return IKS_FILTER_EAT;
00895       }
00896       if (iks_find_with_attrib(pak->query, "feature", "var", "http://www.google.com/xmpp/protocol/voice/v1")) {
00897          resource->cap->jingle = 1;
00898       } else
00899          resource->cap->jingle = 0;
00900    } else if (pak->subtype == IKS_TYPE_GET) {
00901       iks *iq, *disco, *ident, *google, *query;
00902       iq = iks_new("iq");
00903       query = iks_new("query");
00904       ident = iks_new("identity");
00905       disco = iks_new("feature");
00906       google = iks_new("feature");
00907       if (iq && ident && disco && google) {
00908          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "from", client->jid->full);
00909          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "to", pak->from->full);
00910          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "type", "result");
00911          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "id", pak->id);
00912          iks_insert_attrib(query, "xmlns", "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info");
00913          iks_insert_attrib(ident, "category", "client");
00914          iks_insert_attrib(ident, "type", "pc");
00915          iks_insert_attrib(ident, "name", "asterisk");
00916          iks_insert_attrib(disco, "var", "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info");
00917          iks_insert_attrib(google, "var", "http://www.google.com/xmpp/protocol/voice/v1");
00918          iks_insert_node(iq, query);
00919          iks_insert_node(query, ident);
00920          iks_insert_node(query, google);
00921          iks_insert_node(query, disco);
00922          iks_send(client->p, iq);
00923       } else
00924          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of Memory.\n");
00925       if (iq)
00926          iks_delete(iq);
00927       if (query)
00928          iks_delete(query);
00929       if (ident)
00930          iks_delete(ident);
00931       if (google)
00932          iks_delete(google);
00933       if (disco)
00934          iks_delete(disco);
00935    } else if (pak->subtype == IKS_TYPE_ERROR) {
00936       ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "User %s does not support discovery.\n", pak->from->full);
00937    }
00938    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00939    return IKS_FILTER_EAT;
00940 }
00941 
00942 static int aji_dinfo_handler(void *data, ikspak *pak)
00943 {
00944    struct aji_client *client = ASTOBJ_REF((struct aji_client *) data);
00945    char *node = NULL;
00946    struct aji_resource *resource = NULL;
00947    struct aji_buddy *buddy = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND(&client->buddies, pak->from->partial);
00948 
00949    resource = aji_find_resource(buddy, pak->from->resource);
00950    if (pak->subtype == IKS_TYPE_ERROR) {
00951       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Recieved error from a client, turn on jabber debug!\n");
00952       return IKS_FILTER_EAT;
00953    }
00954    if (pak->subtype == IKS_TYPE_RESULT) {
00955       if (!resource) {
00956          ast_log(LOG_NOTICE,"JABBER: Received client info from %s when not requested.\n", pak->from->full);
00957          ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
00958          return IKS_FILTER_EAT;
00959       }
00960       if (iks_find_with_attrib(pak->query, "feature", "var", "http://www.google.com/xmpp/protocol/voice/v1")) {
00961          resource->cap->jingle = 1;
00962       } else
00963          resource->cap->jingle = 0;
00964    } else if (pak->subtype == IKS_TYPE_GET && !(node = iks_find_attrib(pak->query, "node"))) {
00965       iks *iq, *query, *identity, *disco, *reg, *commands, *gateway, *version, *vcard, *search;
00966 
00967       iq = iks_new("iq");
00968       query = iks_new("query");
00969       identity = iks_new("identity");
00970       disco = iks_new("feature");
00971       reg = iks_new("feature");
00972       commands = iks_new("feature");
00973       gateway = iks_new("feature");
00974       version = iks_new("feature");
00975       vcard = iks_new("feature");
00976       search = iks_new("feature");
00977 
00978       if (iq && query && identity && disco && reg && commands && gateway && version && vcard && search && client) {
00979          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "from", client->user);
00980          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "to", pak->from->full);
00981          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "id", pak->id);
00982          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "type", "result");
00983          iks_insert_attrib(query, "xmlns", "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info");
00984          iks_insert_attrib(identity, "category", "gateway");
00985          iks_insert_attrib(identity, "type", "pstn");
00986          iks_insert_attrib(identity, "name", "Asterisk The Open Source PBX");
00987          iks_insert_attrib(disco, "var", "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco");
00988          iks_insert_attrib(reg, "var", "jabber:iq:register");
00989          iks_insert_attrib(commands, "var", "http://jabber.org/protocol/commands");
00990          iks_insert_attrib(gateway, "var", "jabber:iq:gateway");
00991          iks_insert_attrib(version, "var", "jabber:iq:version");
00992          iks_insert_attrib(vcard, "var", "vcard-temp");
00993          iks_insert_attrib(search, "var", "jabber:iq:search");
00994 
00995          iks_insert_node(iq, query);
00996          iks_insert_node(query, identity);
00997          iks_insert_node(query, disco);
00998          iks_insert_node(query, reg);
00999          iks_insert_node(query, commands);
01000          iks_insert_node(query, gateway);
01001          iks_insert_node(query, version);
01002          iks_insert_node(query, vcard);
01003          iks_insert_node(query, search);
01004          iks_send(client->p, iq);
01005       } else {
01006          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01007       }
01008 
01009       if (iq)
01010          iks_delete(iq);
01011       if (query)
01012          iks_delete(query);
01013       if (identity)
01014          iks_delete(identity);
01015       if (disco)
01016          iks_delete(disco);
01017       if (reg)
01018          iks_delete(reg);
01019       if (commands)
01020          iks_delete(commands);
01021       if (gateway)
01022          iks_delete(gateway);
01023       if (version)
01024          iks_delete(version);
01025       if (vcard)
01026          iks_delete(vcard);
01027       if (search)
01028          iks_delete(search);
01029 
01030    } else if (pak->subtype == IKS_TYPE_GET && !strcasecmp(node, "http://jabber.org/protocol/commands")) {
01031       iks *iq, *query, *confirm;
01032       iq = iks_new("iq");
01033       query = iks_new("query");
01034       confirm = iks_new("item");
01035 
01036       if (iq && query && confirm && client) {
01037          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "from", client->user);
01038          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "to", pak->from->full);
01039          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "id", pak->id);
01040          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "type", "result");
01041          iks_insert_attrib(query, "xmlns", "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items");
01042          iks_insert_attrib(query, "node", "http://jabber.org/protocol/commands");
01043          iks_insert_attrib(confirm, "node", "confirmaccount");
01044          iks_insert_attrib(confirm, "name", "Confirm AIM account");
01045          iks_insert_attrib(confirm, "jid", client->user);
01046          iks_insert_node(iq, query);
01047          iks_insert_node(query, confirm);
01048          iks_send(client->p, iq);
01049       } else {
01050          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01051       }
01052       if (iq)
01053          iks_delete(iq);
01054       if (query)
01055          iks_delete(query);
01056       if (confirm)
01057          iks_delete(confirm);
01058 
01059    } else if (pak->subtype == IKS_TYPE_GET && !strcasecmp(node, "confirmaccount")) {
01060       iks *iq, *query, *feature;
01061 
01062       iq = iks_new("iq");
01063       query = iks_new("query");
01064       feature = iks_new("feature");
01065 
01066       if (iq && query && feature && client) {
01067          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "from", client->user);
01068          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "to", pak->from->full);
01069          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "id", pak->id);
01070          iks_insert_attrib(iq, "type", "result");
01071          iks_insert_attrib(query, "xmlns", "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info");
01072          iks_insert_attrib(feature, "var", "http://jabber.org/protocol/commands");
01073          iks_insert_node(iq, query);
01074          iks_insert_node(query, feature);
01075          iks_send(client->p, iq);
01076       } else {
01077          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01078       }
01079       if (iq)
01080          iks_delete(iq);
01081       if (query)
01082          iks_delete(query);
01083       if (feature)
01084          iks_delete(feature);
01085    }
01086 
01087    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
01088    return IKS_FILTER_EAT;
01089 }

01101 /*!
01102  * \brief Handles presence packets.
01103  * \param client structure and the node.
01104  * \return void.
01105  */
01106 static void aji_handle_message(struct aji_client *client, ikspak *pak)
01107 {
01108    struct aji_message *insert, *tmp;
01109    int flag = 0;
01110    
01111    if (!(insert = ast_calloc(1, sizeof(struct aji_message))))
01112       return;
01113    time(&insert->arrived);
01114    if (iks_find_cdata(pak->x, "body"))
01115       insert->message = ast_strdup(iks_find_cdata(pak->x, "body"));
01116    if(pak->id)
01117       ast_copy_string(insert->id, pak->id, sizeof(insert->message));
01118    if (pak->from)
01119       insert->from = ast_strdup(pak->from->full);
01120    AST_LIST_LOCK(&client->messages);
01121    AST_LIST_TRAVERSE_SAFE_BEGIN(&client->messages, tmp, list) {
01122       if (flag) {
01123          AST_LIST_REMOVE_CURRENT(&client->messages, list);
01124          if (tmp->from)
01125             free(tmp->from);
01126          if (tmp->message)
01127             free(tmp->message);
01128       } else if (difftime(time(NULL), tmp->arrived) >= client->message_timeout) {
01129          flag = 1;
01130          AST_LIST_REMOVE_CURRENT(&client->messages, list);
01131          if (tmp->from)
01132             free(tmp->from);
01133          if (tmp->message)
01134             free(tmp->message);
01135       }
01136    }
01137    AST_LIST_TRAVERSE_SAFE_END;
01138    AST_LIST_INSERT_HEAD(&client->messages, insert, list);
01139    AST_LIST_UNLOCK(&client->messages);
01140 }
01141 
01142 static void aji_handle_presence(struct aji_client *client, ikspak *pak)
01143 {
01144    int status, priority;
01145    struct aji_buddy *buddy;
01146    struct aji_resource *tmp = NULL, *last = NULL, *found = NULL;
01147    char *ver, *node, *descrip, *type;
01148    
01149    if(client->state != AJI_CONNECTED)
01150       aji_create_buddy(pak->from->partial, client);
01151 
01152    buddy = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND(&client->buddies, pak->from->partial);
01153    if (!buddy) {
01154       ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "Got presence packet from %s, someone not in our roster!!!!\n", pak->from->partial);
01155       return;
01156    }
01157    type = iks_find_attrib(pak->x, "type");
01158    if(client->component && type &&!strcasecmp("probe", type)) {
01159       aji_set_presence(client, pak->from->full, iks_find_attrib(pak->x, "to"), 1, client->statusmessage);
01160       ast_verbose("what i was looking for \n");
01161    }
01162    ASTOBJ_WRLOCK(buddy);
01163    status = (pak->show) ? pak->show : 6;
01164    priority = atoi((iks_find_cdata(pak->x, "priority")) ? iks_find_cdata(pak->x, "priority") : "0");
01165    tmp = buddy->resources;
01166    descrip = ast_strdup(iks_find_cdata(pak->x,"status"));
01167 
01168    while (tmp) {
01169       if (!strcasecmp(tmp->resource, pak->from->resource)) {
01170          tmp->status = status;
01171          if (tmp->description) free(tmp->description);
01172          tmp->description = descrip;
01173          found = tmp;
01174          if (status == 6) {   /* Sign off Destroy resource */
01175             if (last && found->next) {
01176                last->next = found->next;
01177             } else if (!last) {
01178                if (found->next)
01179                   buddy->resources = found->next;
01180                else
01181                   buddy->resources = NULL;
01182             } else if (!found->next) {
01183                if (last)
01184                   last->next = NULL;
01185                else
01186                   buddy->resources = NULL;
01187             }
01188             free(found);
01189             found = NULL;
01190             break;
01191          }
01192          if (tmp->priority != priority) {
01193             found->priority = priority;
01194             if (!last && !found->next)
01195                break;
01196             if (last)
01197                last->next = found->next;
01198             else
01199                buddy->resources = found->next;
01200             last = NULL;
01201             tmp = buddy->resources;
01202             if (!buddy->resources)
01203                buddy->resources = found;
01204             while (tmp) {
01205                if (found->priority > tmp->priority) {
01206                   if (last)
01207                      last->next = found;
01208                   found->next = tmp;
01209                   if (!last)
01210                      buddy->resources = found;
01211                   break;
01212                }
01213                if (!tmp->next) {
01214                   tmp->next = found;
01215                   break;
01216                }
01217                last = tmp;
01218                tmp = tmp->next;
01219             }
01220          }
01221          break;
01222       }
01223       last = tmp;
01224       tmp = tmp->next;
01225    }
01226 
01227    if (!found && status != 6) {
01228       found = (struct aji_resource *) malloc(sizeof(struct aji_resource));
01229       memset(found, 0, sizeof(struct aji_resource));
01230 
01231       if (!found) {
01232          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory!\n");
01233          return;
01234       }
01235       ast_copy_string(found->resource, pak->from->resource, sizeof(found->resource));
01236       found->status = status;
01237       found->description = descrip;
01238       found->priority = priority;
01239       found->next = NULL;
01240       last = NULL;
01241       tmp = buddy->resources;
01242       while (tmp) {
01243          if (found->priority > tmp->priority) {
01244             if (last)
01245                last->next = found;
01246             found->next = tmp;
01247             if (!last)
01248                buddy->resources = found;
01249             break;
01250          }
01251          if (!tmp->next) {
01252             tmp->next = found;
01253             break;
01254          }
01255          last = tmp;
01256          tmp = tmp->next;
01257       }
01258       if (!tmp)
01259          buddy->resources = found;
01260    }
01261    ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(buddy);
01262    ASTOBJ_UNREF(buddy, aji_buddy_destroy);
01263 
01264    node = iks_find_attrib(iks_find(pak->x, "c"), "node");
01265    ver = iks_find_attrib(iks_find(pak->x, "c"), "ver");
01266 
01267    if(status !=6 && !found->cap) {
01268       found->cap = aji_find_version(node, ver, pak);
01269       if(gtalk_yuck(pak->x)) /* gtalk should do discover */
01270          found->cap->jingle = 1;
01271       if(found->cap->jingle && option_debug > 4) {
01272          if (option_debug)
01273             ast_log(LOG_DEBUG,"Special case for google till they support discover.\n");
01274       }
01275       else {
01276          iks *iq, *query;
01277          iq = iks_new("iq");
01278          query = iks_new("query");
01279          if(query && iq)  {
01280             iks_insert_attrib(iq, "type", "get");
01281             iks_insert_attrib(iq, "to", pak->from->full);
01282             iks_insert_attrib(iq,"from",iks_find_attrib(pak->x,"to"));
01283             iks_insert_attrib(iq, "id", client->mid);
01284             ast_aji_increment_mid(client->mid);
01285             iks_insert_attrib(query, "xmlns", "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info");
01286             iks_insert_node(iq, query);
01287             iks_send(client->p, iq);
01288             
01289          } else
01290             ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01291          if(query)
01292             iks_delete(query);
01293          if(iq)
01294             iks_delete(iq);
01295       }
01296    }
01297    if (option_verbose > 4) {
01298       switch (pak->subtype) {
01299       case IKS_TYPE_AVAILABLE:
01300          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: I am available ^_* %i\n", pak->subtype);
01301          break;
01302       case IKS_TYPE_UNAVAILABLE:
01303          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: I am unavailable ^_* %i\n", pak->subtype);
01304          break;
01305       default:
01306          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: Ohh sexy and the wrong type: %i\n", pak->subtype);
01307       }
01308       switch (pak->show) {
01309       case IKS_SHOW_UNAVAILABLE:
01310          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: type: %i subtype %i\n", pak->subtype, pak->show);
01311          break;
01312       case IKS_SHOW_AVAILABLE:
01313          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: type is available\n");
01314          break;
01315       case IKS_SHOW_CHAT:
01316          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: type: %i subtype %i\n", pak->subtype, pak->show);
01317          break;
01318       case IKS_SHOW_AWAY:
01319          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: type is away\n");
01320          break;
01321       case IKS_SHOW_XA:
01322          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: type: %i subtype %i\n", pak->subtype, pak->show);
01323          break;
01324       case IKS_SHOW_DND:
01325          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: type: %i subtype %i\n", pak->subtype, pak->show);
01326          break;
01327       default:
01328          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: Kinky! how did that happen %i\n", pak->show);
01329       }
01330    }
01331 }
01332 
01333 /*!
01334  * \brief handles subscription requests.
01335  * \param aji_client struct and xml packet.
01336  * \return void.
01337  */
01338 static void aji_handle_subscribe(struct aji_client *client, ikspak *pak)
01339 {
01340    if(pak->subtype == IKS_TYPE_SUBSCRIBE) { 
01341       iks *presence = NULL, *status = NULL;
01342       presence = iks_new("presence");
01343       status = iks_new("status");
01344       if(presence && status) {
01345          iks_insert_attrib(presence, "type", "subscribed");
01346          iks_insert_attrib(presence, "to", pak->from->full);
01347          iks_insert_attrib(presence, "from", client->jid->full);
01348          if(pak->id)
01349             iks_insert_attrib(presence, "id", pak->id);
01350          iks_insert_cdata(status, "Asterisk has approved subscription", 0);
01351          iks_insert_node(presence, status);
01352          iks_send(client->p, presence);
01353       } else
01354          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Unable to allocate nodes\n");
01355       if(presence)
01356          iks_delete(presence);
01357       if(status)
01358          iks_delete(status);
01359       if(client->component)
01360          aji_set_presence(client, pak->from->full, iks_find_attrib(pak->x, "to"), 1, client->statusmessage);
01361    }
01362    if (option_verbose > 4) {
01363       switch (pak->subtype) {
01364       case IKS_TYPE_SUBSCRIBE:
01365          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: This is a subcription of type %i\n", pak->subtype);
01366          break;
01367       case IKS_TYPE_SUBSCRIBED:
01368          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: This is a subcription of type %i\n", pak->subtype);
01369          break;
01370       case IKS_TYPE_UNSUBSCRIBE:
01371          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: This is a subcription of type %i\n", pak->subtype);
01372          break;
01373       case IKS_TYPE_UNSUBSCRIBED:
01374          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: This is a subcription of type %i\n", pak->subtype);
01375          break;
01376       default:          /*IKS_TYPE_ERROR: */
01377          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: This is a subcription of type %i\n", pak->subtype);
01378          break;
01379       }
01380    }
01381 }
01382 
01383 /*!
01384  * \brief sends messages.
01385  * \param aji_client struct , reciever, message.
01386  * \return 1.
01387  */
01388 int ast_aji_send(struct aji_client *client, const char *address, const char *message)
01389 {
01390    int res = 0;
01391    iks *message_packet = NULL;
01392    if (client->state == AJI_CONNECTED) {
01393       message_packet = iks_make_msg(IKS_TYPE_CHAT, address, message);
01394       if (message_packet) {
01395          iks_insert_attrib(message_packet, "from", client->jid->full);
01396          res = iks_send(client->p, message_packet);
01397       } else {
01398          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01399       }
01400       if (message_packet)
01401          iks_delete(message_packet);
01402    } else
01403       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "JABBER: Not connected can't send\n");
01404    return 1;
01405 }

01407 /*!
01408  * \brief create a chatroom.
01409  * \param aji_client struct , room, server, topic for the room.
01410  * \return 0.
01411  */
01412 int ast_aji_create_chat(struct aji_client *client, char *room, char *server, char *topic)
01413 {
01414    int res = 0;
01415    iks *iq = NULL;
01416    iq = iks_new("iq");
01417    if (iq && client) {
01418       iks_insert_attrib(iq, "type", "get");
01419       iks_insert_attrib(iq, "to", server);
01420       iks_insert_attrib(iq, "id", client->mid);
01421       ast_aji_increment_mid(client->mid);
01422       iks_send(client->p, iq);
01423    } else 
01424       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01425    return res;
01426 }

01428 /*!
01429  * \brief join a chatroom.
01430  * \param aji_client struct , room.
01431  * \return res.
01432  */
01433 int ast_aji_join_chat(struct aji_client *client, char *room)
01434 {
01435    int res = 0;
01436    iks *presence = NULL, *priority = NULL;
01437    presence = iks_new("presence");
01438    priority = iks_new("priority");
01439    if (presence && priority && client) {
01440       iks_insert_cdata(priority, "0", 1);
01441       iks_insert_attrib(presence, "to", room);
01442       iks_insert_node(presence, priority);
01443       res = iks_send(client->p, presence);
01444       iks_insert_cdata(priority, "5", 1);
01445       iks_insert_attrib(presence, "to", room);
01446       res = iks_send(client->p, presence);
01447    } else 
01448       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01449    if (presence)
01450       iks_delete(presence);
01451    if (priority)
01452       iks_delete(priority);
01453    return res;
01454 }

01456 /*!
01457  * \brief invite to a chatroom.
01458  * \param aji_client struct ,user, room, message.
01459  * \return res.
01460  */
01461 int ast_aji_invite_chat(struct aji_client *client, char *user, char *room, char *message)
01462 {
01463    int res = 0;
01464    iks *invite, *body, *namespace;
01465 
01466    invite = iks_new("message");
01467    body = iks_new("body");
01468    namespace = iks_new("x");
01469    if (client && invite && body && namespace) {
01470       iks_insert_attrib(invite, "to", user);
01471       iks_insert_attrib(invite, "id", client->mid);
01472       ast_aji_increment_mid(client->mid);
01473       iks_insert_cdata(body, message, 0);
01474       iks_insert_attrib(namespace, "xmlns", "jabber:x:conference");
01475       iks_insert_attrib(namespace, "jid", room);
01476       iks_insert_node(invite, body);
01477       iks_insert_node(invite, namespace);
01478       res = iks_send(client->p, invite);
01479    } else 
01480       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01481    if (body)
01482       iks_delete(body);
01483    if (namespace)
01484       iks_delete(namespace);
01485    if (invite)
01486       iks_delete(invite);
01487    return res;
01488 }
01489 
01490 
01491 /*!
01492  * \brief receive message loop.
01493  * \param aji_client struct.
01494  * \return void.
01495  */
01496 static void *aji_recv_loop(void *data)
01497 {
01498    struct aji_client *client = ASTOBJ_REF((struct aji_client *) data);
01499    int res = IKS_HOOK;
01500    do {
01501       if (res != IKS_OK) {
01502          while(res != IKS_OK) {
01503             if(option_verbose > 3)
01504                ast_verbose("JABBER: reconnecting.\n");
01505             res = aji_reconnect(client);
01506             sleep(4);
01507          }
01508       }
01509 
01510       res = iks_recv(client->p, 1);
01511       client->timeout--;
01512       if (res == IKS_HOOK) 
01513          ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "JABBER: Got hook event.\n");
01514       else if (res == IKS_NET_TLSFAIL)
01515          ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "JABBER:  Failure in TLS.\n");
01516       else if (client->timeout == 0 && client->state == AJI_CONNECTED) {
01517          res = iks_send_raw(client->p, " ");
01518          if(res == IKS_OK)
01519             client->timeout = 50;
01520          else
01521             ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "JABBER:  Network Timeout\n");
01522       } else if (res == IKS_NET_RWERR)
01523          ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "JABBER: socket read error\n");
01524    } while (client);
01525    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
01526    return 0;
01527 }
01528 
01529 /*!
01530  * \brief increments the mid field for messages and other events.
01531  * \param message id.
01532  * \return void.
01533  */
01534 void ast_aji_increment_mid(char *mid)
01535 {
01536    int i = 0;
01537 
01538    for (i = strlen(mid) - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
01539       if (mid[i] != 'z') {
01540          mid[i] = mid[i] + 1;
01541          i = 0;
01542       } else
01543          mid[i] = 'a';
01544    }
01545 }

01636 /*!
01637  * \brief goes through roster and prunes users not needed in list, or adds them accordingly.
01638  * \param aji_client struct.
01639  * \return void.
01640  */
01641 static void aji_pruneregister(struct aji_client *client)
01642 {
01643    int res = 0;
01644    iks *removeiq = iks_new("iq");
01645    iks *removequery = iks_new("query");
01646    iks *removeitem = iks_new("item");
01647    iks *send = iks_make_iq(IKS_TYPE_GET, "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items");
01648 
01649    if (client && removeiq && removequery && removeitem && send) {
01650       iks_insert_node(removeiq, removequery);
01651       iks_insert_node(removequery, removeitem);
01652       ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_TRAVERSE(&client->buddies, 1, {
01653          ASTOBJ_RDLOCK(iterator);
01654          /* For an aji_buddy, both AUTOPRUNE and AUTOREGISTER will never
01655           * be called at the same time */
01656          if (ast_test_flag(iterator, AJI_AUTOPRUNE)) {
01657             res = iks_send(client->p, iks_make_s10n(IKS_TYPE_UNSUBSCRIBE, iterator->name,
01658                   "GoodBye your status is no longer needed by Asterisk the Open Source PBX"
01659                   " so I am no longer subscribing to your presence.\n"));
01660             res = iks_send(client->p, iks_make_s10n(IKS_TYPE_UNSUBSCRIBED, iterator->name,
01661                   "GoodBye you are no longer in the asterisk config file so I am removing"
01662                   " your access to my presence.\n"));
01663             iks_insert_attrib(removeiq, "from", client->jid->full); 
01664             iks_insert_attrib(removeiq, "type", "set"); 
01665             iks_insert_attrib(removequery, "xmlns", "jabber:iq:roster");
01666             iks_insert_attrib(removeitem, "jid", iterator->name);
01667             iks_insert_attrib(removeitem, "subscription", "remove");
01668             res = iks_send(client->p, removeiq);
01669          } else if (ast_test_flag(iterator, AJI_AUTOREGISTER)) {
01670             res = iks_send(client->p, iks_make_s10n(IKS_TYPE_SUBSCRIBE, iterator->name, 
01671                   "Greetings I am the Asterisk Open Source PBX and I want to subscribe to your presence\n"));
01672             ast_clear_flag(iterator, AJI_AUTOREGISTER);
01673          }
01674          ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(iterator);
01675       });
01676    } else
01677       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01678    if (removeiq)
01679       iks_delete(removeiq);
01680    if (removequery)
01681       iks_delete(removequery);
01682    if (removeitem)
01683       iks_delete(removeitem);
01684    if (send)
01685       iks_delete(send);
01686    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_PRUNE_MARKED(&client->buddies, aji_buddy_destroy);
01687 }
01688 
01689 /*!
01690  * \brief filters the roster packet we get back from server.
01691  * \param aji_client struct, and xml packet.
01692  * \return IKS_FILTER_EAT.
01693  */
01694 static int aji_filter_roster(void *data, ikspak *pak)
01695 {
01696    struct aji_client *client = ASTOBJ_REF((struct aji_client *) data);
01697    int flag = 0;
01698    iks *x = NULL;
01699    struct aji_buddy *buddy;
01700    
01701    client->state = AJI_CONNECTED;
01702    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_TRAVERSE(&client->buddies, 1, {
01703       ASTOBJ_RDLOCK(iterator);
01704       x = iks_child(pak->query);
01705       flag = 0;
01706       while (x) {
01707          if (!iks_strcmp(iks_name(x), "item")) {
01708             if (!strcasecmp(iterator->name, iks_find_attrib(x, "jid"))) {
01709                flag = 1;
01710                ast_clear_flag(iterator, AJI_AUTOPRUNE | AJI_AUTOREGISTER);
01711             }
01712          }
01713          x = iks_next(x);
01714       }
01715       if (!flag)
01716          ast_copy_flags(iterator, client, AJI_AUTOREGISTER);
01717       if (x)
01718          iks_delete(x);
01719       ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(iterator);
01720    });
01721 
01722    x = iks_child(pak->query);
01723    while (x) {
01724       flag = 0;
01725       if (iks_strcmp(iks_name(x), "item") == 0) {
01726          ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_TRAVERSE(&client->buddies, 1, {
01727             ASTOBJ_RDLOCK(iterator);
01728             if (!strcasecmp(iterator->name, iks_find_attrib(x, "jid")))
01729                flag = 1;
01730             ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(iterator);
01731          });
01732 
01733          if (!flag) {
01734             buddy = (struct aji_buddy *) malloc(sizeof(struct aji_buddy));
01735             if (!buddy) {
01736                ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Out of memory\n");
01737                return 0;
01738             }
01739             memset(buddy, 0, sizeof(struct aji_buddy));
01740             ASTOBJ_INIT(buddy);
01741             ASTOBJ_WRLOCK(buddy);
01742             ast_copy_string(buddy->name, iks_find_attrib(x, "jid"), sizeof(buddy->name));
01743             ast_clear_flag(buddy, AST_FLAGS_ALL);
01744             if(ast_test_flag(client, AJI_AUTOPRUNE)) {
01745                ast_set_flag(buddy, AJI_AUTOPRUNE);
01746                buddy->objflags |= ASTOBJ_FLAG_MARKED;
01747             } else
01748                ast_set_flag(buddy, AJI_AUTOREGISTER);
01749             ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(buddy);
01750             if (buddy) {
01751                ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_LINK(&client->buddies, buddy);
01752                ASTOBJ_UNREF(buddy, aji_buddy_destroy);
01753             }
01754          }
01755       }
01756       x = iks_next(x);
01757    }
01758    if (x)
01759       iks_delete(x);
01760    aji_pruneregister(client);
01761 
01762    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
01763    return IKS_FILTER_EAT;
01764 }
01765 
01766 static int aji_reconnect(struct aji_client *client)
01767 {
01768    int res = 0;
01769 
01770    if (client->state)
01771       client->state = AJI_DISCONNECTED;
01772    client->timeout=50;
01773    if (client->p)
01774       iks_parser_reset(client->p);
01775    if (client->authorized)
01776       client->authorized = 0;
01777 
01778    if(client->component)
01779       res = aji_component_initialize(client);
01780    else
01781       res = aji_client_initialize(client);
01782 
01783    return res;
01784 }
01785 
01786 static int aji_get_roster(struct aji_client *client)
01787 {
01788    iks *roster = NULL;
01789    roster = iks_make_iq(IKS_TYPE_GET, IKS_NS_ROSTER);
01790    if(roster) {
01791       iks_insert_attrib(roster, "id", "roster");
01792       aji_set_presence(client, NULL, client->jid->full, 1, client->statusmessage);
01793       iks_send(client->p, roster);
01794    }
01795    if (roster)
01796       iks_delete(roster);
01797    return 1;
01798 }
01799 
01800 /*!
01801  * \brief connects as a client to jabber server.
01802  * \param aji_client struct, and xml packet.
01803  * \return res.
01804  */
01805 static int aji_client_connect(void *data, ikspak *pak)
01806 {
01807    struct aji_client *client = ASTOBJ_REF((struct aji_client *) data);
01808    int res = 0;
01809 
01810    if (client) {
01811       if (client->state == AJI_DISCONNECTED) {
01812          iks_filter_add_rule(client->f, aji_filter_roster, client, IKS_RULE_TYPE, IKS_PAK_IQ, IKS_RULE_SUBTYPE, IKS_TYPE_RESULT, IKS_RULE_ID, "roster", IKS_RULE_DONE);
01813          client->state = AJI_CONNECTING;
01814          client->jid = (iks_find_cdata(pak->query, "jid")) ? iks_id_new(client->stack, iks_find_cdata(pak->query, "jid")) : client->jid;
01815          iks_filter_remove_hook(client->f, aji_client_connect);
01816          if(!client->component) /*client*/
01817             aji_get_roster(client);
01818       }
01819    } else
01820       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01821 
01822    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
01823    return res;
01824 }
01825 
01826 /*!
01827  * \brief prepares client for connect.
01828  * \param aji_client struct.
01829  * \return 1.
01830  */
01831 static int aji_client_initialize(struct aji_client *client)
01832 {
01833    int connected = 0;
01834 
01835    connected = iks_connect_via(client->p, S_OR(client->serverhost, client->jid->server), client->port, client->jid->server);
01836 
01837    if (connected == IKS_NET_NOCONN) {
01838       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "JABBER ERROR: No Connection\n");
01839       return IKS_HOOK;
01840    } else   if (connected == IKS_NET_NODNS) {
01841       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "JABBER ERROR: No DNS %s for client to  %s\n", client->name, S_OR(client->serverhost, client->jid->server));
01842       return IKS_HOOK;
01843    } else
01844       iks_recv(client->p, 30);
01845    return IKS_OK;
01846 }
01847 
01848 /*!
01849  * \brief prepares component for connect.
01850  * \param aji_client struct.
01851  * \return 1.
01852  */
01853 static int aji_component_initialize(struct aji_client *client)
01854 {
01855    int connected = 1;
01856 
01857    connected = iks_connect_via(client->p, S_OR(client->serverhost, client->jid->server), client->port, client->user);
01858    if (connected == IKS_NET_NOCONN) {
01859       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "JABBER ERROR: No Connection\n");
01860       return IKS_HOOK;
01861    } else if (connected == IKS_NET_NODNS) {
01862       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "JABBER ERROR: No DNS %s for client to  %s\n", client->name, S_OR(client->serverhost, client->jid->server));
01863       return IKS_HOOK;
01864    } else if (!connected) 
01865       iks_recv(client->p, 30);
01866    return IKS_OK;
01867 }
01868 
01869 /*!
01870  * \brief disconnect from jabber server.
01871  * \param aji_client struct.
01872  * \return 1.
01873  */
01874 int ast_aji_disconnect(struct aji_client *client)
01875 {
01876    if (client) {
01877       if (option_verbose > 3)
01878          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: Disconnecting\n");
01879       iks_disconnect(client->p);
01880       iks_parser_delete(client->p);
01881       ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
01882    }
01883 
01884    return 1;
01885 }
01886 
01887 /*!
01888  * \brief set presence of client.
01889  * \param aji_client struct, user to send it to, and from, level, description.
01890  * \return void.
01891  */
01892 static void aji_set_presence(struct aji_client *client, char *to, char *from, int level, char *desc)
01893 {
01894    int res = 0;
01895    iks *presence = iks_make_pres(level, desc);
01896    iks *cnode = iks_new("c");
01897    iks *priority = iks_new("priority");
01898 
01899    iks_insert_cdata(priority, "0", 1);
01900    if (presence && cnode && client) {
01901       if(to)
01902          iks_insert_attrib(presence, "to", to);
01903       if(from)
01904          iks_insert_attrib(presence, "from", from);
01905       iks_insert_attrib(cnode, "node", "http://www.asterisk.org/xmpp/client/caps");
01906       iks_insert_attrib(cnode, "ver", "asterisk-xmpp");
01907       iks_insert_attrib(cnode, "ext", "voice-v1");
01908       iks_insert_attrib(cnode, "xmlns", "http://jabber.org/protocol/caps");
01909       iks_insert_node(presence, cnode);
01910       res = iks_send(client->p, presence);
01911    } else
01912       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory.\n");
01913    if (cnode)
01914       iks_delete(cnode);
01915    if (presence)
01916       iks_delete(presence);
01917 }

01919 /*!

01921  * \param fd, number of args, args.
01922  * \return RESULT_SUCCESS.
01923  */
01924 static int aji_do_debug(int fd, int argc, char *argv[])
01925 {
01926    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_TRAVERSE(&clients, 1, {
01927       ASTOBJ_RDLOCK(iterator); 
01928       iterator->debug = 1;
01929       ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(iterator);
01930    });
01931    ast_cli(fd, "Jabber Debugging Enabled.\n");
01932    return RESULT_SUCCESS;
01933 }

01937  * \param fd, number of args, args.
01938  * \return RESULT_SUCCESS.
01939  */
01940 static int aji_do_reload(int fd, int argc, char *argv[])
01941 {
01942    aji_reload();
01943    ast_cli(fd, "Jabber Reloaded.\n");
01944    return RESULT_SUCCESS;
01945 }
