01947 /*!
01948  * \brief turnoff console debugging.
01949  * \param fd, number of args, args.
01950  * \return RESULT_SUCCESS.
01951  */
01952 static int aji_no_debug(int fd, int argc, char *argv[])
01953 {
01954    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_TRAVERSE(&clients, 1, {
01955       ASTOBJ_RDLOCK(iterator);
01956       iterator->debug = 0;
01957       ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(iterator);
01958    });
01959    ast_cli(fd, "Jabber Debugging Disabled.\n");
01960    return RESULT_SUCCESS;
01961 }
01962 
01963 /*!
01964  * \brief show client status.
01965  * \param fd, number of args, args.
01966  * \return RESULT_SUCCESS.
01967  */
01968 static int aji_show_clients(int fd, int argc, char *argv[])
01969 {
01970    char *status;
01971    int count = 0;
01972    ast_cli(fd, "Jabber Users and their status:\n");
01973    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_TRAVERSE(&clients, 1, {
01974       ASTOBJ_RDLOCK(iterator);
01975       count++;
01976       switch (iterator->state) {
01977       case AJI_DISCONNECTED:
01978          status = "Disconnected";
01979          break;
01980       case AJI_CONNECTING:
01981          status = "Connecting";
01982          break;
01983       case AJI_CONNECTED:
01984          status = "Connected";
01985          break;
01986       default:
01987          status = "Unknown";
01988       }
01989       ast_cli(fd, "       User: %s     - %s\n", iterator->user, status);
01990       ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(iterator);
01991    });
01992    ast_cli(fd, "----\n");
01993    ast_cli(fd, "   Number of users: %d\n", count);
01994    return RESULT_SUCCESS;
01995 }
01996 
01997 /*!
01998  * \brief send test message for debugging.
01999  * \param fd, number of args, args.
02000  * \return RESULT_SUCCESS.
02001  */
02002 static int aji_test(int fd, int argc, char *argv[])
02003 {
02004    struct aji_client *client;
02005    struct aji_resource *resource;
02006    const char *name = "asterisk";
02007    struct aji_message *tmp;
02008 
02009    if (argc > 3)
02010       return RESULT_SHOWUSAGE;
02011    else if (argc == 3)
02012       name = argv[2];
02013 
02014    if (!(client = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND(&clients, name))) {
02015       ast_cli(fd, "Unable to find client '%s'!\n", name);
02016       return RESULT_FAILURE;
02017    }
02018 
02019    /* XXX Does Matt really want everyone to use his personal address for tests? */ /* XXX yes he does */
02020    ast_aji_send(client, "mogorman@astjab.org", "blahblah");
02021    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_TRAVERSE(&client->buddies, 1, {
02022       ASTOBJ_RDLOCK(iterator);
02023       ast_verbose("User: %s\n", iterator->name);
02024       for (resource = iterator->resources; resource; resource = resource->next) {
02025          ast_verbose("Resource: %s\n", resource->resource);
02026          if(resource->cap) {
02027             ast_verbose("   client: %s\n", resource->cap->parent->node);
02028             ast_verbose("   version: %s\n", resource->cap->version);
02029             ast_verbose("   Jingle Capable: %d\n", resource->cap->jingle);
02030          }
02031          ast_verbose("  Priority: %d\n", resource->priority);
02032          ast_verbose("  Status: %d\n", resource->status); 
02033          ast_verbose("  Message: %s\n", S_OR(resource->description,"")); 
02034       }
02035       ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(iterator);
02036    });
02037    ast_verbose("\nOooh a working message stack!\n");
02038    AST_LIST_LOCK(&client->messages);
02039    AST_LIST_TRAVERSE(&client->messages, tmp, list) {
02040       ast_verbose("  Message from: %s with id %s @ %s %s\n",tmp->from, S_OR(tmp->id,""), ctime(&tmp->arrived), S_OR(tmp->message, ""));
02041    }
02042    AST_LIST_UNLOCK(&client->messages);
02043    ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
02044 
02045    return RESULT_SUCCESS;
02046 }
02047 
02048 /*!
02049  * \brief creates aji_client structure.
02050  * \param label, ast_variable, debug, pruneregister, component/client, aji_client to dump into. 
02051  * \return 0.
02052  */
02053 static int aji_create_client(char *label, struct ast_variable *var, int debug)
02054 {
02055    char *resource;
02056    struct aji_client *client = NULL;
02057    int flag = 0;
02058 
02059    client = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND(&clients,label);
02060    if (!client) {
02061       flag = 1;
02062       client = (struct aji_client *) malloc(sizeof(struct aji_client));
02063       if (!client) {
02064          ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Out of memory!\n");
02065          return 0;
02066       }
02067       memset(client, 0, sizeof(struct aji_client));
02068       ASTOBJ_INIT(client);
02069       ASTOBJ_WRLOCK(client);
02070       ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_INIT(&client->buddies);
02071    } else {
02072       ASTOBJ_WRLOCK(client);
02073       ASTOBJ_UNMARK(client);
02074    }
02075    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_MARKALL(&client->buddies);
02076    ast_copy_string(client->name, label, sizeof(client->name));
02077    ast_copy_string(client->mid, "aaaaa", sizeof(client->mid));
02078 
02079    client->debug = debug;
02080    ast_copy_flags(client, &globalflags, AST_FLAGS_ALL);
02081    client->port = 5222;
02082    client->usetls = 1;
02083    client->usesasl = 1;
02084    client->forcessl = 0;
02085    client->keepalive = 1;
02086    client->timeout = 50;
02087    client->message_timeout = 100;
02088    AST_LIST_HEAD_INIT(&client->messages);
02089    client->component = 0;
02090    ast_copy_string(client->statusmessage, "Online and Available", sizeof(client->statusmessage));
02091 
02092    if (flag) {
02093       client->authorized = 0;
02094       client->state = AJI_DISCONNECTED;
02095    }
02096    while (var) {
02097       if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "username"))
02098          ast_copy_string(client->user, var->value, sizeof(client->user));
02099       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "serverhost"))
02100          ast_copy_string(client->serverhost, var->value, sizeof(client->serverhost));
02101       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "secret"))
02102          ast_copy_string(client->password, var->value, sizeof(client->password));
02103       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "statusmessage"))
02104          ast_copy_string(client->statusmessage, var->value, sizeof(client->statusmessage));
02105       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "port"))
02106          client->port = atoi(var->value);
02107       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "timeout"))
02108          client->message_timeout = atoi(var->value);
02109       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "debug"))
02110          client->debug = (ast_false(var->value)) ? 0 : 1;
02111       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "type")) {
02112          if (!strcasecmp(var->value, "component"))
02113             client->component = 1;
02114       } else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "usetls")) {
02115          client->usetls = (ast_false(var->value)) ? 0 : 1;
02116       } else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "usesasl")) {
02117          client->usesasl = (ast_false(var->value)) ? 0 : 1;
02118       } else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "forceoldssl"))
02119          client->forcessl = (ast_false(var->value)) ? 0 : 1;
02120       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "keepalive"))
02121          client->keepalive = (ast_false(var->value)) ? 0 : 1;
02122       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "autoprune"))
02123          ast_set2_flag(client, ast_true(var->value), AJI_AUTOPRUNE);
02124       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "autoregister"))
02125          ast_set2_flag(client, ast_true(var->value), AJI_AUTOREGISTER);
02126       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "buddy"))
02127             aji_create_buddy(var->value, client);
02128    /* no transport support in this version */
02129    /* else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "transport"))
02130             aji_create_transport(var->value, client);
02131    */
02132       var = var->next;
02133    }
02134    if (!flag) {
02135       ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(client);
02136       ASTOBJ_UNREF(client, aji_client_destroy);
02137       return 1;
02138    }
02139    client->p = iks_stream_new(((client->component) ? "jabber:component:accept" : "jabber:client"), client, aji_act_hook);
02140    if (!client->p) {
02141       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Failed to create stream for client '%s'!\n", client->name);
02142       return 0;
02143    }
02144    client->stack = iks_stack_new(8192, 8192);
02145    if (!client->stack) {
02146       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Failed to allocate stack for client '%s'\n", client->name);
02147       return 0;
02148    }
02149    client->f = iks_filter_new();
02150    if (!client->f) {
02151       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "Failed to create filter for client '%s'\n", client->name);
02152       return 0;
02153    }
02154    if (!strchr(client->user, '/') && !client->component) { /*client */
02155       resource = NULL;
02156       asprintf(&resource, "%s/asterisk", client->user);
02157       if (resource) {
02158          client->jid = iks_id_new(client->stack, resource);
02159          free(resource);
02160       }
02161    } else
02162       client->jid = iks_id_new(client->stack, client->user);
02163    if (client->component) {
02164       iks_filter_add_rule(client->f, aji_dinfo_handler, client, IKS_RULE_NS, "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info", IKS_RULE_DONE);
02165       iks_filter_add_rule(client->f, aji_ditems_handler, client, IKS_RULE_NS, "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#items", IKS_RULE_DONE);
02166       iks_filter_add_rule(client->f, aji_register_query_handler, client, IKS_RULE_SUBTYPE, IKS_TYPE_GET, IKS_RULE_NS, "jabber:iq:register", IKS_RULE_DONE);
02167       iks_filter_add_rule(client->f, aji_register_approve_handler, client, IKS_RULE_SUBTYPE, IKS_TYPE_SET, IKS_RULE_NS, "jabber:iq:register", IKS_RULE_DONE);
02168    } else {
02169       iks_filter_add_rule(client->f, aji_client_info_handler, client, IKS_RULE_NS, "http://jabber.org/protocol/disco#info", IKS_RULE_DONE);
02170    }
02171    if (!strchr(client->user, '/') && !client->component) { /*client */
02172       resource = NULL;
02173       asprintf(&resource, "%s/asterisk", client->user);
02174       if (resource) {
02175          client->jid = iks_id_new(client->stack, resource);
02176          free(resource);
02177       }
02178    } else
02179       client->jid = iks_id_new(client->stack, client->user);
02180    iks_set_log_hook(client->p, aji_log_hook);
02181    ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(client);
02182    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_LINK(&clients,client);
02183    return 1;
02184 }
02185 
02186 /*!
02187  * \brief creates transport.
02188  * \param label, buddy to dump it into. 
02189  * \return 0.
02190  */
02191 /* no connecting to transports today */
02192 /*
02193 static int aji_create_transport(char *label, struct aji_client *client)
02194 {
02195    char *server = NULL, *buddyname = NULL, *user = NULL, *pass = NULL;
02196    struct aji_buddy *buddy = NULL;
02197 
02198    buddy = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND(&client->buddies,label);
02199    if (!buddy) {
02200       buddy = malloc(sizeof(struct aji_buddy));
02201       if(!buddy) {
02202          ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Out of memory\n");
02203          return 0;
02204       }
02205       memset(buddy, 0, sizeof(struct aji_buddy));
02206       ASTOBJ_INIT(buddy);
02207    }
02208    ASTOBJ_WRLOCK(buddy);
02209    server = label;
02210    if ((buddyname = strchr(label, ','))) {
02211       *buddyname = '\0';
02212       buddyname++;
02213       if (buddyname && buddyname[0] != '\0') {
02214          if ((user = strchr(buddyname, ','))) {
02215             *user = '\0';
02216             user++;
02217             if (user && user[0] != '\0') {
02218                if ((pass = strchr(user, ','))) {
02219                   *pass = '\0';
02220                   pass++;
02221                   ast_copy_string(buddy->pass, pass, sizeof(buddy->pass));
02222                   ast_copy_string(buddy->user, user, sizeof(buddy->user));
02223                   ast_copy_string(buddy->name, buddyname, sizeof(buddy->name));
02224                   ast_copy_string(buddy->server, server, sizeof(buddy->server));
02225                   return 1;
02226                }
02227             }
02228          }
02229       }
02230    }
02231    ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(buddy);
02232    ASTOBJ_UNMARK(buddy);
02233    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_LINK(&client->buddies, buddy);
02234    return 0;
02235 }
02236 */
02237 
02238 /*!
02239  * \brief creates buddy.
02240  * \param label, buddy to dump it into. 
02241  * \return 0.
02242  */
02243 static int aji_create_buddy(char *label, struct aji_client *client)
02244 {
02245    struct aji_buddy *buddy = NULL;
02246    int flag = 0;
02247    buddy = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND(&client->buddies,label);
02248    if (!buddy) {
02249       flag = 1;
02250       buddy = malloc(sizeof(struct aji_buddy));
02251       if(!buddy) {
02252          ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "Out of memory\n");
02253          return 0;
02254       }
02255       memset(buddy, 0, sizeof(struct aji_buddy));
02256       ASTOBJ_INIT(buddy);
02257    }
02258    ASTOBJ_WRLOCK(buddy);
02259    ast_copy_string(buddy->name, label, sizeof(buddy->name));
02260    ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(buddy);
02261    if(flag)
02262       ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_LINK(&client->buddies, buddy);
02263    else {
02264       ASTOBJ_UNMARK(buddy);
02265       ASTOBJ_UNREF(buddy, aji_buddy_destroy);
02266    }
02267    return 1;
02268 }
02269 
02270 /*!
02271  * \brief load config file.
02272  * \param void. 
02273  * \return 1.
02274  */
02275 static int aji_load_config(void)
02276 {
02277    char *cat = NULL;
02278    int debug = 1;
02279    struct ast_config *cfg = NULL;
02280    struct ast_variable *var = NULL;
02281 
02282    /* Reset flags to default value */
02283    ast_set_flag(&globalflags, AJI_AUTOPRUNE | AJI_AUTOREGISTER);
02284 
02285    cfg = ast_config_load(JABBER_CONFIG);
02286    if (!cfg) {
02287       ast_log(LOG_WARNING, "No such configuration file %s\n", JABBER_CONFIG);
02288       return 0;
02289    }
02290 
02291    cat = ast_category_browse(cfg, NULL);
02292    for (var = ast_variable_browse(cfg, "general"); var; var = var->next) {
02293       if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "debug"))
02294          debug = (ast_false(ast_variable_retrieve(cfg, "general", "debug"))) ? 0 : 1;
02295       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "autoprune"))
02296          ast_set2_flag(&globalflags, ast_true(var->value), AJI_AUTOPRUNE);
02297       else if (!strcasecmp(var->name, "autoregister"))
02298          ast_set2_flag(&globalflags, ast_true(var->value), AJI_AUTOREGISTER);
02299    }
02300 
02301    while (cat) {
02302       if (strcasecmp(cat, "general")) {
02303             var = ast_variable_browse(cfg, cat);
02304             aji_create_client(cat, var, debug);
02305       }
02306       cat = ast_category_browse(cfg, cat);
02307    }
02308    return 1;
02309 }
02310 
02311 /*!
02312  * \brief grab a aji_client structure by label name.
02313  * \param void. 
02314  * \return 1.
02315  */
02316 struct aji_client *ast_aji_get_client(const char *name)
02317 {
02318    struct aji_client *client = NULL;
02319 
02320    client = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND(&clients, name);
02321    if (!client && !strchr(name, '@'))
02322       client = ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_FIND_FULL(&clients, name, user,,, strcasecmp);
02323    return client;
02324 }
02325 
02326 struct aji_client_container *ast_aji_get_clients(void)
02327 {
02328    return &clients;
02329 }
02330 
02331 static char mandescr_jabber_send[] =
02332 "Description: Sends a message to a Jabber Client.\n"
02333 "Variables: \n"
02334 "  Jabber:  Client or transport Asterisk uses to connect to JABBER.\n"
02335 "  ScreenName: User Name to message.\n"
02336 "  Message: Message to be sent to the buddy\n";
02337 
02338 /*! \brief  Send a Jabber Message via call from the Manager */
02339 static int manager_jabber_send(struct mansession *s, const struct message *m)
02340 {
02341    struct aji_client *client = NULL;
02342    const char *id = astman_get_header(m,"ActionID");
02343    const char *jabber = astman_get_header(m,"Jabber");
02344    const char *screenname = astman_get_header(m,"ScreenName");
02345    const char *message = astman_get_header(m,"Message");
02346 
02347    if (ast_strlen_zero(jabber)) {
02348       astman_send_error(s, m, "No transport specified");
02349       return 0;
02350    }
02351    if (ast_strlen_zero(screenname)) {
02352       astman_send_error(s, m, "No ScreenName specified");
02353       return 0;
02354    }
02355    if (ast_strlen_zero(message)) {
02356       astman_send_error(s, m, "No Message specified");
02357       return 0;
02358    }
02359 
02360    astman_send_ack(s, m, "Attempting to send Jabber Message");
02361    client = ast_aji_get_client(jabber);
02362    if (!client) {
02363       astman_send_error(s, m, "Could not find Sender");
02364       return 0;
02365    }  
02366    if (strchr(screenname, '@') && message){
02367       ast_aji_send(client, screenname, message);   
02368       if (!ast_strlen_zero(id))
02369          astman_append(s, "ActionID: %s\r\n",id);
02370       astman_append(s, "Response: Success\r\n");
02371       return 0;
02372    }
02373    if (!ast_strlen_zero(id))
02374       astman_append(s, "ActionID: %s\r\n",id);
02375    astman_append(s, "Response: Failure\r\n");
02376    return 0;
02377 }
02378 
02379 
02380 static int aji_reload()
02381 {
02382    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_MARKALL(&clients);
02383    if (!aji_load_config()) {
02384       ast_log(LOG_ERROR, "JABBER: Failed to load config.\n");
02385       return 0;
02386    }
02387    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_PRUNE_MARKED(&clients, aji_client_destroy);
02388    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_TRAVERSE(&clients, 1, {
02389       ASTOBJ_RDLOCK(iterator);
02390       if(iterator->state == AJI_DISCONNECTED) {
02391          if (!iterator->thread)
02392             ast_pthread_create_background(&iterator->thread, NULL, aji_recv_loop, iterator);
02393       } else if (iterator->state == AJI_CONNECTING)
02394          aji_get_roster(iterator);
02395       ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(iterator);
02396    });
02397    
02398    return 1;
02399 }
02400 
02401 static int unload_module(void)
02402 {
02403    ast_cli_unregister_multiple(aji_cli, sizeof(aji_cli) / sizeof(struct ast_cli_entry));
02404    ast_unregister_application(app_ajisend);
02405    ast_unregister_application(app_ajistatus);
02406    ast_manager_unregister("JabberSend");
02407    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_TRAVERSE(&clients, 1, {
02408       ASTOBJ_RDLOCK(iterator);
02409       if (option_verbose > 2)
02410          ast_verbose(VERBOSE_PREFIX_3 "JABBER: %s\n", iterator->name);
02411       iterator->state = AJI_DISCONNECTED;
02412       ast_aji_disconnect(iterator);
02413       pthread_join(iterator->thread, NULL);
02414       ASTOBJ_UNLOCK(iterator);
02415    });
02416 
02417    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_DESTROYALL(&clients, aji_client_destroy);
02418    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_DESTROY(&clients);
02419 
02420    ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "res_jabber unloaded.\n");
02421    return 0;
02422 }
02423 
02424 static int load_module(void)
02425 {
02426    ASTOBJ_CONTAINER_INIT(&clients);
02427    if(!aji_reload())
02428       return AST_MODULE_LOAD_DECLINE;
02429    ast_manager_register2("JabberSend", EVENT_FLAG_SYSTEM, manager_jabber_send,
02430          "Sends a message to a Jabber Client", mandescr_jabber_send);
02431    ast_register_application(app_ajisend, aji_send_exec, ajisend_synopsis, ajisend_descrip);
02432    ast_register_application(app_ajistatus, aji_status_exec, ajistatus_synopsis, ajistatus_descrip);
02433    ast_cli_register_multiple(aji_cli, sizeof(aji_cli) / sizeof(struct ast_cli_entry));
02434 
02435    ast_log(LOG_NOTICE, "res_jabber.so loaded.\n");
02436    return 0;
02437 }
02438 
02439 static int reload(void)
02440 {
02441    aji_reload();
02442    return 0;
02443 }
02444 
02445 AST_MODULE_INFO(ASTERISK_GPL_KEY, AST_MODFLAG_GLOBAL_SYMBOLS, "AJI - Asterisk Jabber Interface",
02446       .load = load_module,
02447       .unload = unload_module,
02448       .reload = reload,
02449           );
